page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My dad is the only British Telecom man in the area. If he gets a call-out he takes the person's phone number and address and goes there. He sometimes has to replace phones. When he is at work he has only one break from 12.00 to 12.15 pm. Dad works from 8 am to 4 pm. When he comes home on a Thursday, he takes me to dancing in Inverness. Sometimes my dad has to work on a Saturday, which he doesn't like. He has also been away on courses to learn more about new telephones. These last for one or two weeks and have taken place in Edinburgh and Harrogate. Dad takes his holidays during the school holidays and looks after my brother and me. Sometimes when dad is working mum takes us into town and we meet him during his break.
